Title: Series: Theatrum Pictorium
Description: Plate 45: Rest on the flight into Egypt, with at centre the seated Virgin and Child, St Joseph standing nearby and leaning on a wall, the ass and the ox on the right; after Lanzani. Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Peeter van Lisebetten
Intermediary draughtsman: David Teniers the Younger
Curator's comments: This is plate 45 from 246 plates of Teniers' Theatre of Paintings, for comment on the series see A,8.1.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (7) (see)
